name: Rally 9000
description:
Rally 9000 is a simple 3D rally game. Complete tracks as fast as possible, and unlock levels and upgrades!
This game aims to deliver the best of arcade and simulation racing in one package!

Key Features:
1. Custom Level Editor!
2. Random wildlife events: wildlife may run out onto the the track at any given moment
3. In-game shop to purchase dozens vehicle upgrades, new tracks and more!
4. Six car models
5. Customize car colors, and neon lighting
6. Complex weather systems including rain storms & snow.
7. Day & night tracks.
8. Damageable vehicles
9. Online steam leader-boards & local high scores
10. Fantastical tracks
11. Consistent bug patches
12. Updates with new features and tracks
